summary:
Plays the awesome music of the Dragonborn DLC when you are in Skyrim!
Obviously requires Dragonborn ;)
descriptionHtml:
Hi there,
I was a bit disappointed when I saw that the Solstheim\'s musics were playing only on the island, so I made this mod which allows the games to play these tracks when you are in Skyrim !

The musics will play on the wilderness of Skyrim (mountains, plains, forest...) but also in towns.
 I hope this mod will be useful for a bunch of you ;)
Installation: 
  -simple NMM install;
  -manual installation : extract the file and drag and drop the data folder to your Skyrim installation, no music are added. 

/!\\ This mod doesn\'t add any music, it just plays music from the Dragonborn DLC when you are in skyrim.

Thanks!
Cheers

PS: I\'m going to do a better description sometime soon, but I\'m pretty busy at the moment...
author: AlexP
